New Records: Virat Kohli became the highest run-scorer in T20 World Cup history by surpassing Mahela Jayawardene's total of 1,016 runs
Key Match Events: Kohli scored 64 off 44 balls, guiding India to 184/6 after 20 overs against Bangladesh
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli's performance was a key factor in India's victory over Bangladesh
